snippet: The aerospace giant EADS, which manufactures Airbus passenger aircraft, says it is in merger talks with its British rival, BAE Systems.
abstract: The aerospace giant EADS, which manufactures Airbus passenger aircraft, says it is in merger talks with its British rival, BAE Systems.
